src.geodesy package#

Submodules#

src.geodesy.approx_euclidean_proj module#

A module for manipulating an approximate euclidean projection.

class src.geodesy.approx_euclidean_proj.ApproxEuclideanProj(x_central: float, y_central: float)[source]#

Bases: EuclideanProj

This class represents an approximate Euclidean projection system.

Parameters:

  • x_central (float) – x coordinate of the central point of the Euclidean system.

  • y_central (float) – y coordinate of the central point of the Euclidean system.

Note

A Euclidean system is a local Euclidean reference system in which the collinear equation is valid.

eucli_to_world(coor_eucli: ndarray) → ndarray[source]#

Transform a point from the Euclidean coordinate reference system into the world coordinate reference system.

Parameters:

coor_eucli – Euclidean coordinate of the point [X, Y, Z].

Returns:

Point in the World coordinate reference system.

Return type:

np.array

mat_eucli_to_mat(x: float, y: float, mat_eucli: ndarray) → ndarray[source]#

Transform the rotation matrix (Euclidean system) into rotation matrix (World system).

Parameters:

  • x (float) – x coordinate of the point.

  • y (float) – y coordinate of the point.

  • mat_eucli (np.array) – Rotation matrix (Euclidean system).

Returns:

Rotation matrix (World system).

Return type:

np.array

mat_to_mat_eucli(x: float, y: float, mat: ndarray) → ndarray[source]#

Transform the rotation matrix (World system) into rotation matrix (Euclidian systeme).

Parameters:

  • x (float) – x coordinate of the point.

  • y (float) – y coordinate of the point.

  • mat (np.array) – Rotation matrix (World system).

Returns:

Euclidean rotation matrix.

Return type:

np.array

world_to_eucli(coor_world: ndarray) → ndarray[source]#

Transform a point from the world coordinate reference system into the Euclidean coordinate reference system.

Parameters:

coor_world (np.array) – World coordinate of the point [X, Y, Z].

Returns:

Point in the Euclidean coordinate reference system.

Return type:

np.array

src.geodesy.euclidean_proj module#

A module for manipulating an euclidean projection.

class src.geodesy.euclidean_proj.EuclideanProj(x_central: float, y_central: float)[source]#

Bases: object

This class represents a Euclidean projection system.

Parameters:

  • x_central (float) – x coordinate of the central point of the Euclidean system.

  • y_central (float) – y coordinate of the central point of the Euclidean system.

Note

A Euclidean system is a local Euclidean reference system in which the collinear equation is valid.

x_central: float#
y_central: float#

src.geodesy.local_euclidean_proj module#

A module for manipulating a local euclidean projection.

class src.geodesy.local_euclidean_proj.LocalEuclideanProj(x_central: float, y_central: float)[source]#

Bases: EuclideanProj

This class represents a Euclidean projection system.

Parameters:

  • x_central (float) – x coordinate of the central point of the Euclidean system.

  • y_central (float) – y coordinate of the central point of the Euclidean system.

Note

A Euclidean system is a local Euclidean reference system in which the collinear equation is valid. The cartographic system parameters must be known.

eucli_to_world(coor: ndarray) → ndarray[source]#

Transform a point from the Euclidean coordinate reference system into the world coordinate reference system.

Parameters:

coor (np.ndarray) – Coordinate [X, Y, Z].

Returns:

x, y, z in the world coordinate reference system.

Return type:

np.array

mat_eucli_to_mat(x: float, y: float, mat_eucli: ndarray) → ndarray[source]#

Transform the rotation matrix (Euclidean system) into rotation matrix (World system).

Parameters:

  • x (float) – x coordinate of the point.

  • y (float) – y coordinate of the point.

  • mat_eucli (np.array) – Rotation matrix (Euclidean system).

Returns:

Rotation matrix (World system).

Return type:

np.array

mat_rot_euclidean_local(x: float, y: float) → ndarray[source]#

Compute the transition matrix between the world system and the Euclidean system centred on a point.

Parameters:

  • x (float) – x coordinate of the central point of the Euclidean system.

  • y (float) – y coordinate of the central point of the Euclidean system.

Returns:

Transition matrix.

Return type:

np.array

mat_to_mat_eucli(x: float, y: float, mat: ndarray) → ndarray[source]#

Transform the rotation matrix (World system) into rotation matrix (Euclidian systeme).

Parameters:

  • x (float) – x coordinate of the point.

  • y (float) – y coordinate of the point.

  • mat (np.array) – Rotation matrix (World system).

Returns:

Euclidean rotation matrix.

src.geodesy.proj_engine module#

Module for manipulating a cartographic system.

class src.geodesy.proj_engine.ProjEngine(*args, **kwargs)[source]#

Bases: TransformGeodesy

This class provides functions for using a cartographic system.

epsg: int = None#
geoid: list = None#
get_meridian_convergence(x_carto: ndarray | List[float] | float, y_carto: ndarray | List[float] | float) → ndarray[source]#

Compute meridian convergence. Values are extracted from pyproj.

Parameters:

  • x_carto (np.array, List[float], float) – x cartographic coordinates.

  • y_carto (np.array, List[float], float) – y cartographic coordinates.

Returns:

Meridian convergence in degree.

Return type:

np.array

get_scale_factor(x_carto: ndarray | List[float] | float, y_carto: ndarray | List[float] | float) → ndarray[source]#

Compute scale factor. Values are extracted from pyproj.

Parameters:

  • x_carto (Union[np.array, List[float], float]) – x cartographic coordinates.

  • y_carto (Union[np.array, List[float], float]) – y cartographic coordinates.

Returns:

Scale factor and meridian convergence.

Return type:

np.array

set_epsg(epsg: int, geoid: list | None = None) → None[source]#

Setter of the class ProjEngine. Allows to init the class with data.

Parameters:

  • epsg (int) – Code epsg of the porjection ex: “EPSG:2154”.

  • geoid (list) – List of geoid to use.

src.geodesy.transform_geodesy module#

Module for class ProjEngine, transform geodesy

class src.geodesy.transform_geodesy.TransformGeodesy[source]#

Bases: object

This class provides functions to tranform coordinate system. Class parent of ProjEngine. Implemented by ProjEngine.

Parameters:

  • geoid (list) – List of geoid to use.

  • crs (pyproj) – CRS pyproj of the worksite.

carto_to_geoc = None#
carto_to_geog = None#
geoc_to_carto = None#
geog_to_carto = None#
geog_to_geoid = None#
geoid_to_geog = None#
tf_geoid(geoid: list) → None[source]#

Create attribute transform, to transform geographic coordinates to geoide coordinates.

Parameters:

geoid (list) – List of geoid to use.

Converting z in height to z in altitude of point.

Parameters:

coor (np.array) – [X, Y, Z] coordinate of the point.

float
